updateMenu.added: The following new effects will be added to your Automated Animation Autorecognition settings.
updateMenu.custom: The following effects will not be added due to them already existing from another source.
updateMenu.customHint: These effects will be ignored. To have Eskie Macro Pack manage them, please remove them from Automated Animations and resubmit.
updateMenu.updated: The following effects will be updated from a previous version of Eskie Macro Pack.
updateMenu.warning: This will overwrite any existing animations from Eskie Macro Pack with the same name. It will not touch any other animations.
updateMenu.nothing: All Eskie Macro animations are up to date!
